Hotel Novotel Goa Shrem Resort

Goa

The 85 rooms Novotel Goa Shrem Resort is a short walk from Candolim beach in North Goa, popular for its vibrant culture, beaches, adventure sports, flea markets, cafes and nightclubs.

Facilities:
